name: Brown Sugar Glazed Salmon
instructions: 2. In a small bowl, mix together the brown sugar, soy sauce, Dijon mustard, olive oil, salt, and pepper until well combined.
3. Place the salmon fillet on a baking sheet lined with foil. Brush the glaze mixture over the top of the salmon, ensuring it is fully coated.
4. Bake the salmon in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until it is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
5. Remove the salmon from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
description: This recipe for Brown Sugar Glazed Salmon creates a sweet and tangy glaze that perfectly complements the rich flavor of the salmon. It is a quick and easy dish that is perfect for a weeknight dinner or a special occasion.
